[TEXT]
<line: 29> THIS MATTER is before the Court on James M. Dedman, IV’s 
<line: 30> Application for Admission to Practice Pro Hac Vice of Phillip E. Reeves. It 
<line: 31> appearing that Phillip E. Reeves is a member in good standing with the South 
<line: 32> Carolina State Bar and will be appearing with James M. Dedman, IV, a member 
<line: 33> in good standing with the Bar of this court, that all admission fees have been paid, 
<line: 34> and that the email address of the attorney seeking admission has been provided, 
<line: 35> the court enters the following Order.  

[TITLE]
<line: 37> ORDER 

[TEXT]
<line: 39> IT IS, THEREFORE, ORDERED that James M. Dedman, IV’s 
<line: 40> Application for Admission to Practice Pro Hac Vice (#6) of Phillip E. Reeves is  

[TEXT]
<line: 2> GRANTED, and that Phillip E. Reeves is ADMITTED to practice, pro hac vice
<line: 3> before the Bar of this court while associated with James M. Dedman, IV.

[ABANDON]
<line: 5> Signed: June 29, 2017

[TEXT]
<line: 7> Dennis L. Howell
<line: 8> United States Magistrate Judge
